pkgmetadata.longdescription: Iterated Ordinary Least Squares Regression // Addresses the 'log of zero' by developing a new family of estimators called iterated Ordinary Least Squares. This family nests standard approaches such as log-linear and Poisson regressions, offers several computational advantages, and corresponds to the correct way to perform the popular log(Y + 1) transformation. For more details about how to use it, see the notebook at: https://www.davidbenatia.com/.
